name: Assistant7
author: StickyPages

sections.description:
Assistant7 is here to integrate with Commerce7. Helping integrate with Guest Counters and Product Reviews.

Services

To communicate with Commerce7, we have implemented an API to communicate with our servers as well as Commerce7’s server.
If you do not use Commerce7, this plugin will not work for you.

Commerce7
https://commerce7.com/
https://commerce7.com/privacy

OUR API, report7.co
https://report7.co/
https://report7.co/privacy

API Urls include
https://api.report7.co/
sections.installation:
• PHP version 7.0 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.6 or greater
  • WordPress Memory limit of 64 MB or greater (128 MB or higher is preferred)
  1. Install using the WordPress built-in Plugin installer, or Extract the zip file and drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Settings > Assistant7
sections.changelog:
2.0

  • ADDED: Ratings on collections page
  • ADDED: Overall rating at top of product page
  • FIXED: Add review Form

1.0

  • Initial launch
